description: Try our easy to follow Pumpkin, Polenta & Poppyseed Loaf recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pumpkin, Polenta & Poppyseed Loaf Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400 g spiced pumpkin and sweet potato

recipeInstructions.text: Grease and line a loaf tin with baking paper. Transfer mixture to lined tin. Top with remaining cheese and bake for 25-30 minutes or until cooked when tested with a skewer. Slice thickly and serve with butter.
